response.overview: We ignore the crumbs. We step over them, brush them off.  But sometimes, it's the crumbs that reveal the whole story.  Crumb Theory is a 2-minute short film about the subtle weight of overlooked moments. A quiet main character drifts through the noise, unaware of what the fragments are trying to say.  Written & Directed by: [Tabriz Aliyev, Nabi Yagublu] Runtime: 2 minutes Language: No dialogue / English Subtitles Country: Azerbaijan  Thank you for watching. If it meant something to you â€” share it.
response.title: Crumb Theory
